help-file.title: "WAY OF THE WIND"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> & <player> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Teleportation
"Way of the Wind" creates an artery in the ether barely big enough to accommodate the caster and flings him all the way to the person he selected as his target, no matter how far away his target may be.
Warning: Sometimes this artery can rupture, depositing the caster someplace completely unexpected (and perhaps very dangerous).
